summarized_judgment: the supreme court of india mugneeram bangur & co vs sardar gurbachan singh on 16 december, 1964. in may 1941, the respondent entered into a contract with the appellant company for the purchase of a plot of land in a colony scheme. in 1946, the company claimed that the contract stood cancelled. the company denied having received the circular letter and filed a suit in 1946.

tagline: John Douglas Keith Brown vs State Of West Bengal on 17 December, 1964
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india john douglas keith brown vs. state of west bengal on 17 december 1964 equivalent citations. the appellant was charged with an offence under s. 92 read with s. 52 of the act and convicted. in appeal and by the high court, supreme court in revisioned the provisions of. the act.

tagline: V. K. A. Ranganatha Konar vs The Tiruchirappalli Municipal ... on 18 December, 1964
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india v. k. a. ranganatha konar vs tiruchirappalli municipal. court ruled under s. 4 ( 1 ) of the madras city tenants'protection act, 1921 ( mad act 3 of 1922 ) court determined the value of the hulls made by the appellant and sub - lessee was to be delivered within three months of thev.

tagline: Mohd. Sulaiman vs Mohd. Ayub & Anr on 9 December, 1964
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india mohd. sulaiman vs. ayub & anr on 9 december 1964 equivalent citations : 1965 air 1319, 1965 scr ( 2 ) 398 act : civil dispute - person hiring article for own use later claiming ownership by purchase - dispute about nature of agreement - hirer whether guilty of breach of trust.

tagline: Hindustan Construction Co. Ltd. vs V.S. Gaitonde, Income-Tax ... on 10 December, 1964
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india hindustan construction co. ltd. vs v. s. gaitonde, income - tax. in 1961, the appellant filed a revision under article 226 of the constitution of india. this is an appeal on a certificate granted by the high court of bombay against its judgment dated february 24, 1961.

tagline: Jeshwantrai Mulukchand vs Anandilal Bapalal on 7 December, 1964
summarized_judgment: supreme court of india jeshwantrai mulukchand vs anandilal bapalal on 7 december 1964. he filed a suit for the fixation of standard rent and during its pendency paid the provisional standard rent fixed by the court of small causes. after the final order fixing the standard rent of rs. 125 / per month passed on november 9, 1956.
